name: Figma Linux 0.10.0
body:
## Features:
* Add checkbox for enbale/disable figma-linux themes

## Bug Fixes:
* Update icons for deb package for LaunchPad
* Fixes theme manager rules for better display themes colors
* Fixes missing home toolbar bg color
* Fixes tab sizing for user interactions and adds focus to new tabs. (https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/pull/269)

## Other Changes:
* remove unnecessary libm library
* Bump Electron version from 13.6.3 to 13.6.9
* replace scss on css
* Remove the old libstdc++ library

name: Figma Linux 0.9.6
body:

* tab sizing for user interactions and adds focus to new tabs

## Other Changes:
* Bump Electron version from 13.6.3 to 13.6.9
* replace scss on css
* Remove the old libstdc++ library

name: Figma Linux 0.9.0
body:
## Features:
* Implement get access mic. [#238](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/238)

## Bug Fixes:
* Avoid setting defaultProtocolClient if already set. [#241](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/241)
* open project after switch accounts. [#210](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/210)
* fix blank screen after first switch on tab
* Updated module for read local fonts
* Change category to graphics ( [#232)](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/232))
* fix workflow for flatpak

## Other Changes:
* Removed freetype2 library

name: Figma Linux 0.8.1
body:
## Bug Fixes:
* fix size of close icon
* fix build app for ppa repository

name: Figma Linux 0.8.0

name: Figma Linux 0.7.4
body:
## Bug Fixes:
* Fix generate release notes for deb changelog

name: Figma Linux 0.7.3
body:
## Bug Fixes:
* fix: reset color palette after sync themes. [#181](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/181)
* fix: disabled program implementation of window drag
* fix: apply color palette

## Other Changes:
* other: update appimage.sh
* other: add flatpak workflow
* other: Update generate_release_notes.pl script

name: Figma Linux 0.7.2
body:
## Features:
* feat: implemented dialogs via Zenity. [#159](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/159)

## Bug Fixes:
* fix: update icon for home button
* fix: Fix to make window snapping work again. [#186](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/186)
* fix: exporting files with the slash symbol in name
* fix: Titlebar revamp. [#170](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/170)
* fix: Log out button does nothing. [#188](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/188)
* fix: Logs out on every start. [#189](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/189)
* fix: update README
* fix: update build appImage
* fix: reset settings after exporting of a file

## Other Changes:
* other: update artifact name for packages
* other: added workflow
* other: Improve application name in desktop file. [#161](https://github.com/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/issues/161)
* other: Bump Electron.js version to 12.0.2
* other: add arm64v8
* other: added generate_release_notes.pl script
* other: added script for bump figma linux version

name: Figma-linux v0.7.1
body:
## Bug fixes
*  Fixed #154 - copy as PNG
*  Fixed #155 - get local fonts

name: Figma-linux v0.7.0
body:
## Features:
* Added support of Figma Plugins
* Added themes and Theme Creator 
* Updated window frame
* Updated main menu
* Updated UI of the app
* Updated help menu
* Added a menu item for opens project and prototypes links from clipboard
* Updated settings
* Updated .desktop files
* Updated Desktop API for communicate with Figma Web App
* Changed behavior of opening projects
* Updated tabs behavior

## Bug fixes
*  Fixed #127 - Duplicate window buttons

## Other changes
*  Updated electron to 11.1.1

name: Figma-linux v0.6.4
body:
## Bug fixes
*  Fixed #139 - Desktop App is out of date

name: Figma-linux v0.6.3
body:
## Bug fixes
*  Fixed #86 - present mode
*  Fixed #93 - Fix characters in file dialog for snap package.
*  Fixed open link from app
*  Fixed #75 - App stops responding after login
*  Fixed #82, #108, #79 - Fix login via google chrome and chromium browsers.
*  Fixed #115 - Fix bug with zoom.
*  improve application GPU performance (thx @devhammed)
*  Added window control (thx @crtnr)

name: Figma-linux v0.6.2
body:
## Bug fixes
*  Fixed #88 - Figma Desktop App is out of date

name: Figma-linux v0.6.1

name: Figma-linux v0.6.0
body:
## Bug fixes
*  Fixed #72 - Sign in bug 
*  Fixed #70, #57, #60 - Segmentation fault 

## Other changes
*  Updated electron to 7.1.2
*  Updated TypeScript to 3.7.2
*  Updated electron-builder to 22.1.0
*  Replaced C++ native module on Rust native module with the same logic

name: Figma-linux v0.5.0
body:
# What's new

*  Added a new setting for disabling the native module (disable local fount support)
*  Added log in stdout with count of all fonts
*  Added open gpu info in the help meny entry

# Bug fixes
*  Fixed #27 (build of the pacman package)
*  Fixed #30
*  Updated the node native module. Close #35

name: Figma-linux v0.4.0
body:
# What's new

*  Added the disable main menu feature.
*  Added the restore last tabs feature.

# Bug fixes
*  Fixed #28 - change the figma desktop version on 12. But late, it is able to broke the figma-linux app. (Need implement a full desktop functional for 13 version)
